Module kivakit.data.compression
Package com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree

Class Tree<Symbol>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree.Tree<Symbol>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Tree<Symbol>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Leaf, Node
    public abstract class Tree<Symbol>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Tree<Symbol>>
    A Huffman coding tree, composed of Node and Leaf sub-trees. Symbols in the tree are assigned a code with encode() and the encoded symbols can be retrieved with codedSymbols(). Symbols can be decoded with decode(BitReader), which reads compressed data with BitReader and walks the tree until if finds the code symbol.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
